pros.name: NaviGo
pros.tagline:
RT Location Services

A p2p e2e encypted service for location sharing, chat and voice calls

pros.name: Pipeline
pros.tagline:
DSC based EDMS

A DSC based Freeform EDMS. The service was designed to be freeform so that its deployment could be seamless and would require little or no training of users. It further simplified matters by not requiring a login based user authentication

pros.name: SRGen
pros.tagline:
Service Request Generator

Autofill for PDF forms. Most EDMS systems used PDF forms, which often required data to be entered. In many enterprises and institutions, such EDM systems required the same data to be added over and over. SRGen solves this by filling them for the user. Designed to be an optional suppliment to Pipeline.

pros.name: Giller
pros.tagline:
Webhook Handler

A Node.js based webhook handler for trigger event from version control systems such as github and bitbucket

pros.name: CodEngine
pros.tagline:
Online Code Compiler

Organisation require developers who can code. There is no better way to check a developer's competance. Codengine strives to achieve this.

pros.name: mef
pros.tagline:
Mobile Entity Framework

A framework to Track, Ping and recieve inputs from mobile entities place on/with persons, assets and employees.
Trackers form the base of the system. Each tracker is connected to a network, of which the Server is part. Each tracker uses a Last Mile Delivery system to interact with a Mobile Entity. The Tracker is essentially a distributed proxy for the Server and is responsible for delivering the pings, identifying inputs and reporting presence to the server. The design is meant to accomodate all configurations. But wherever such accomodations haven't been taken into consideration, the design is aligned towards deployment in a Hospital.

pros.name: iMed
pros.tagline:
The frontend framework for the mef project.

iMed was designed to be the interface for managing and interacting with mobile entities on the network

pros.name: Allopay
pros.tagline:
Asynchronus Payment Processor / Gateway

Payment Gateway and Processors are using outdated methods, technologies and protocols. Allopay solves all of these in one go. Allopay is an centralised online platform for users to manage transactions related all accounts they hold in partner banks. All transactions are charged to the platform account and realised using EFTs between accounts. Electonic Standing Institutions and use of Asynchronus authorizations are implemented to enhance the UX and also reduce hassles such as timeouts. The system also provides a proper legal framework for recurring payment processing.
